Abilities: Str 21, Dex 15, Con 14, Int 2, Wis 12, Cha 7

Descripci\u00f3n: These powerful omnivores resemble gorillas but are far more aggressive; they kill and eat anything they can catch. An adult male ape is 5-1/2 to 6 feet tall and weighs 300 to 400 pounds.

Combate: Skills: Apes have a +8 racial bonus on Climb checks and can always choose to take 10 on Climb checks, even if rushed or threatened.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Ape]
